result.execSummary:
The defendant Bacarri Geron Carson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess/Illegally Obtained Prescription, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 450.11(7)(h).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay costs, fees and surcharges by 9-14-2015 or civil judgment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bacarri Geron Carson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Student Intern Morgan Wilz, appears under the student practice rule, under the supervision of Assistant District Attorney Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.

Court sentences defendant to serve 2 days  in the House of Correction with credit for 2 days, a TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.
Court orders defednant to pay costs, fees and surcharges by 9-14-2015 or civil judgment. 

filed: Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Statements by parties that case may resolve with a Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Defense requests a projected guilty plea date. Court orders case adjourned to Branch 45.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State's file not in court.  Defense requests another status date. Court orders case adjourned to Br 45.  Status conference scheduled for June 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court with attorney Hazel Jean Washington.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State has turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense requests a status conference date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Matter before court for status of counsel.  Defendant has retained attorney Washington.  Clerk notified by attorney Washington's office that she is unable to appear today and requests to appear 5/27/2015 at 1:30 pm.  Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for May 27, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Attorney Mogren informs court that he has been appointed to this case and that the defendant now wishes to hire private counse.  Motion of the defense counsel to withdraw granted by the Court.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for May 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Catelin Ringersma appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
State turned over an offer and discovery.  Defense requests a scheduling conference date. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 46.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 04-22-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Bacarri Geron Carson
Current: 5627 West Center Street, Milwauke, WI 53210   (Effective: 03-25-2015)
Prior: 5627 West Center Street, Milwauke, WI 53210
Defendant states he is undecided about an attorney

Defendant Bacarri Geron Carson in court.  Christopher J. Ladwig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Reserve Judge, Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. 
Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible. The case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Br.46.vb
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 03-25-2015 at 01:30pm.
